nodes.text: This Mandalorian super commando captain was a member of Death Watch during the Clone Wars and later a member of Darth Maul's faction of Mandalorian super commandos after Maul killed the Death Watch leader Pre Vizsla.

This Mandalorian took part in the Takeover of Mandalore betraying the Sith Darth Maul and Savage Opress along with his fellow Death Watch members. When Maul and Opress took revenge upon Vizsla by killing him, this Mandalorian sided with Maul. He was made a captain of the new super commandos and donned red Mandalorian armor He participated in the battle that took place afterward, where he led a several super commandos into giving chase to Bo-Katan Kryze and the recent escapee Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi along with multiple Nite Owl soldiers. Although his commandos chased the renegades into one of the landing platforms, the captain abandoned the pursuit at some point before reaching the hangar.

The commando wore unique horns on his helmet, resembling Zabrak horns, in honor of the Nightbrothers Darth Maul and Savage Opress, who became the leaders of the Mandalorian super commandos until the death of Savage Opress.
